Title: 39059 - # Components of a Great Website
Direction: 500 words: List 3-6 components that make up a great website. In today’s age, a company’s website says everything about them. It is the first impression, the company resume, how they show the world what they have to offer. Discuss key elements of a great website that is effective and truly draws customers in. You can mention the client link by listing one of the most important tips is a call-to-action that results in an immediate sale. You can tell the audience to make sure they have their merchant processing in order and ready for secure transactions. Your target audience is startup and small businesses of a wide range of industries.

Title: 39060 - # Tips to Increase the Efficiency of Your Small Business
Direction: 500 words: List 3-6 tips for making a small business more efficient. Small businesses do not have the same resources of larger companies that they compete with. However, there are strategies and services that can make them much more efficient and keep them in the business arena. Discuss ways that small business can increase their efficiency; for example, outsourcing various services to cut down on cost and time. You can mention the client link by talking about having a secure and easy way of making transactions is a key component. Your target audience is business owners and solo professionals.

Title: 39061 - # E-mail Marketing Tips for E-Commerce
Direction: 500 words: List 3-6 tips for e-mail marketing for your online business. E-mail marketing is a powerful tool used to gain awareness and draw in potential customers. It has many other features that make it a go-to marketing tool as well including the ability to send e-mail blasts to the masses, automated follow-up, etc. Discuss different ways to make the most out of an e-mail marketing campaign used by online businesses. You can mention the client link by listing one of the most important tips is a call-to-action that results in an immediate sale. You can tell the audience to make sure they have their merchant processing in order and ready for secure transactions. Your target audience is marketing professionals and business owners.
